dict.string: Phyllo needs camera access to capture photos of your meals for nutrition analysis.
Phyllo needs photo library access to select meal photos for nutrition analysis.
Phyllo reads health data to provide personalized nutrition recommendations based on your activity and biometrics.
Phyllo writes nutrition data to Health to track your dietary intake alongside other health metrics.
Phyllo uses the microphone for voice descriptions of meals to improve analysis accuracy.
Phyllo sends timely reminders for your meal windows and check-ins to help you stay on track with your nutrition goals.
